'''Dawn's Drifting Reverie''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 5.4]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2025-02-12 11:00:00 UTC+8 &mdash; 2025-03-04 17:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the 5-star character {{Wish Item|Yumemizuki Mizuki}} will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters {{Wish Item|Gorou; Sayu; Xiangling}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* After this event wish ends, the 5-star character {{Wish Item|Yumemizuki Mizuki}} will be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]" in the [[Version 5.5|next version]].
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
